channel.title: presentation on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in presentation on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: Presentation Video Software
item.description: Presentation Video Software Mission Provide the world’s easiest solution for making videos with your own presentations Problem Video editing, specifically in presentations, are full of repetitive tasks Niche sector is not yet met with adequate solution Video editing isn’t utilizing the level of internet and AI enough in 2020 Solution Automatic custom subtitles for your videos Generate fun & intuitive transitions for your videos Allow creators to focus on the content, not the editing
item.content:encoded: Presentation Video Software Mission Provide the world&rsquo;s easiest solution for making videos with your own presentations Problem Video editing, specifically in presentations, are full of repetitive tasks Niche sector is not yet met with adequate solution Video editing isn&rsquo;t utilizing the level of internet and AI enough in 2020 Solution Automatic custom subtitles for your videos Generate fun &amp; intuitive transitions for your videos Allow creators to focus on the content, not the editing
